page.title: 11A youth club.
page.content: I go to{Holy Cross Youth Club.}There is a television, snooker table, dart board, table tennis and a tuck shop. Sometimes we have discos or videos. We get about 30 people on Tuesday evening and about 60 on Fridays. The club is open on Friday from 1900 hrs. to 2200 hrs. Membership costs Â£0.50p per year and Â£0.10p per night. At the youth club I have made many friends. Fund-raising is sometimes needed to improve our amenities such as a pin-ball machine. Money was raised for a mini-bus by having sponsored discos. You are not allowed to smoke, swear or drink alchohol at the club. There is a Â£0.10p fine for swearing, your cigarettes are thrown in the waste bin, alchohol is poured down the drain resulting in possible exclusion from the club.
